/usr/bin/clang++  -Wall  -fdiagnostics-color=always -fvisibility-inlines-hidden -g -arch arm64 -dynamiclib -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names -o libRIV.dylib -install_name @rpath/libRIV.dylib CMakeFiles/RIV.dir/RIV.cpp.o   -L/opt/homebrew/Cellar/llvm/21.1.3/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/homebrew/Cellar/llvm/21.1.3/lib -undefined dynamic_lookup
